types.html:
jeter des fleurs

  1. (figuratively) to say nice things to, to compliment [with à ‘someone’]
    Synonyms: envoyer des fleurs, lancer des fleurs
  2. (reflexive) to toot one's own horn, to blow one's own horn

Usage notes

[edit]
  • Not to be confused with faire une fleur.
